abstract: Cesar Millan, the star of the “Dog Whisperer” television series, is planning an extensive celebrity branding campaign in China.
snippet: Cesar Millan, the star of the “Dog Whisperer” television series, is planning an extensive celebrity branding campaign in China.
lead_paragraph: It has not always been easy for dogs in China. They have been beaten, eaten and, once, were banned in Beijing.

headline.main: Dog Expert’s Dos and Don’ts for Pet Owners in China
headline.print_headline: Dog Expert’s Dos and Don’ts For Pet Owners in China
